page.shortlink: api objects response object redirect method
page.description: Redirect the client and optionally terminate processing the current page
page.prototype: Context.Response.Redirect as V (Url as C, EndResponse as L = .F.)

argument.name: Url
argument.description: The URL to which the client should be redirected.

argument.name: EndResponse
argument.description: Flag for whether page execution should terminate immediately or not. This defaults to .F.

page.discussion: Context.Response.Redirect() Redirect the client by returning a 302 Redirect HTTP status code and optionally terminate processing the current page.
